A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's a Star Wars movie!  Did every single part of the movie makes sense and tie into my own vision for the movie? No.  Was like completely riveted to the screen for 2 1/2 hours and plan to go see it again? Absolutely. Was it better than Jar Jar Binks? Not even a question.

I just don't get why so many fans are so down on this movie. Maybe they are just cooler than me. 

Don't hesitate. Go see it. We both know you're going to anyways. :-)
